short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help Amazon sellers write SEO-friendly product descriptions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Amazon SEO Helper extension generates Amazon product descriptions...at the click of ONE button. The resulting descriptions are accurate, detailed, and SEO friendly. Perfect for sellers managing multiple product listings or those who lack the time or skills to craft unique descriptions for a large inventory of items. The extension is compatible with Amazon Seller Central.
